info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 5:03AM EST until January 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Localized amounts exceeding a foot are possible in northern La Porte and southwest Berrien counties. * WHERE...In Indiana, Northern La Porte, Southern La Porte and Western St. Joseph IN Counties. In Michigan, Southern Berrien County. * WHEN...From 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ this evening to 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...System snow tonight will transition to bands of heavy lake effect snow Friday into Friday night. Intense snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour will be possible within dominant lake effect snow bands. The heaviest snowfall and potential major impacts favor northern La Porte and southwest Berrien counties.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
